name: Safari Arena: Animal Fighter
description:
Battle with ferocious big cats and massive mammals in a wildlife showdown to decide who is truly the most dangerous beast alive! Use powerful jaws and razor sharp claws to fight your way to victory! Pick your favorite animal, step into the arena, and prove that you are the one true Safari Champion!

Download the Safari Arena today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ ARCADE STYLE GAMEPLAY - Use combo attacks or just button mash your way into the wildlife record books!
+ 10 SAFARI FIGHTERS - Pick your favorite animal to lay the smack down with; Tiger, Lion, Elephant, and many more!
+ DYNAMIC ENEMY AI - Stay sharp as your opponent adapts in real-time to give you the fight of your life!
+ BEAUTIFUL 3D ARENAS - Throw down in one of five gorgeous 3D environments!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition will transport you straight to the African savanna!

Download the Safari Arena and battle with the most dangerous animals to ever roam the Earth!

Be sure to check out our awesome Virtual Pets too! Raid villages for gold with the Virtual Pet Dragon or cower in fear of the ferocious T. Rex!
